verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [ARGM-MNR: officially] [V: opened] [ARG1: the new U.S. Embassy] [ARGM-LOC: in Jerusalem] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , [ARGM-ADV: in a historic move cheered by Israelis but met with mass protests from Palestinians that turned deadly in the lead - up to the ceremony] .

The Trump administration officially opened the new U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem on Monday , in [ARG1: a historic move] [V: cheered] [ARG0: by Israelis] but met with mass protests from Palestinians that turned deadly in the lead - up to the ceremony .

The Trump administration officially opened the new U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem on Monday , in [ARG0: a historic move] cheered by Israelis but [V: met] [ARG1: with mass protests from Palestinians that turned deadly in the lead - up to the ceremony] .

The Trump administration officially opened the new U.S. Embassy in Jerusalem on Monday , in a historic move cheered by Israelis but met with [ARG1: mass protests from] Palestinians [R-ARG1: that] [V: turned] [ARG2: deadly] [ARGM-TMP: in the lead - up to the ceremony] .
